resources.string: Send your device\'s logs to the developer.\nDo this only if you was asked to do so.
SendLog will collect the device log and send it to the developer.\nYou will have an opportunity to review and modify the data being sent.
Install the free SendLog application to collect the device log and send it to the developer.
I\'m the donator. My sender hash is...

This is an open-source application released under the GPLv3 license. It is free and will remain free. If you really like it or if you are annoyed by the ads, please consider donating (via paypal). I'll remove the ads for you as soon as possible.
Thank you!

For all the WebSMS donators: the noads code is working for SMSdroid as well.
To remove ads, you need to load the noads code. It is available as soon the donation arrives. Please be patient and drop me a mail if it does not work after one day.
To verify your donation your paypal id (mail address) is needed:
